privacy:
Bluetide does not store any of your Bluesky account data or timeline data.

We only share the data sent to the app to Bluesky for request processing like logging into your account.

If you do not trust us, you can take a look at the source code over at GitHub, you can find this at n1d3v/Bluetide.

You can find the Bluesky privacy policy over at: https://bsky.social/about/support/privacy-policy.
